Html: If I copy the GMap.NET cache from one computer to another, and take a look at the maps on the target computer, 90% of the tiles are there, but here and there some tiles do not load (I get the blue tiles). But on the original computer I did pan to that area so it should be in the cache? Do you know why some tiles must be getting lost when copying the cache from one pc to another?
you must prefetch, just panning isn't enough
